name: Magnetized knight
description:
The knight is sent to a dangerous task in which he must complete all the riddles of an abandoned castle - using gravity for this.

Magnetized knight is a platformer puzzle in which we play the role of a knight who decides to pass all the tests. To overcome the challenges, our hero will be given a gravitational helmet with the help of which it will be possible to change the gravity of the earth and easily overcome obstacles along the ceiling.

Game features:
- Old school gameplay
- Pixel art graphics
